title: 05/30/23: Employees holidays management with Emprez
content: For your employees Holidays management, Emprez offers you the list of useful tutorials that will simplify your task for this period:Emprez gives you the possibility to add vacation days in batch to your employees.For more information, see the article: Adding Holidays in Batch.You may prefer to manage your employees' vacations in hours rather than days, to give you greater flexibility if you want to account for half days of vacation for example.To learn more, see the article: Manage vacations in hours.If you wish to have an overview of the day-off/vacations of the past periods, click here.If you want to use the vacation bank, click here.To place an employee on vacations on the schedule, click here.If you want to give your employees autonomy to make their leave request via the web portal or the mobile application, here are the tutorials:Employee web portalEmployee mobile applicationHelpful?00Updated: 1 year ago Share :
